formal situations make me uncomfortable.

participant_2.background:

i love all of my beautiful children.
I've started to write short stories in my spare time.
i have a little sister.
I take care of myself physically and mentally.

content.text: Hey there, what are you up to today?
Today is my day off so I'm spending it with my kids.
That's great! I wish I could spend more time with my family, but I'm always so busy with work.
I know how that goes, I try to make sure my kids are taken care of before I spend time doing what I enjoy.
What do you enjoy doing in your spare time?
I've started to write short stories in my spare time, it's really fun!
That sounds like a great way to relax and de-stress.
It really is, plus I get to be creative and use my imagination.
What type of stories do you write?
I write a variety of different stories, but I really enjoy writing fantasy and sci-fi stories.
Those are my favorite genres! I would love to read some of your stories sometime.
I would love to share them with you!
That's great! I'll message you my email address and you can send them to me.
Sounds good! I'll get on that right away
